blocks.name: cquot
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the quotient of a polynomial division.
blocks.origin: const class cquot { quot }

blocks.name: diff.cquot.s
diff.cquot.c
diff.cquot.w
df-quot
blocks.content: Define the quotient function on polynomials. This is the ` q ` of the expression ` f = g x. q + r ` in the division algorithm. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-quot(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cquot, cmpo(s0, s1, cfv(cply, cc), cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)), crio(s2, cfv(cply, cc), wsbc(s3, co(cv(s0), cof(cmin), co(cv(s1), cof(cmul), cv(s2))), wo(wceq(cv(s3), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(s3)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(s1))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-quot(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ quot =(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), s1 ‚àà((Poly ` ‚ÑÇ)\ { 0p })‚Ü¶ iota(s2 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),[(s0[oF(-)](s1[oF(√ó)]s2))/ s3](s3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` s3)[<](deg ` s1))))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

thm quotval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3an1(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)))
  sseli(c0, cfv(cply, c1), cfv(cply, cc))
  syl3an2(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, cc)))
  sseli(c2, cfv(cply, c1), cfv(cply, cc))
  plyssc(c1)
  3impb(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, cc)), wne(c2, c0p), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))))
  sylan2br(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wa(wcel(c2, cfv(cply, cc)), wne(c2, c0p)), wceq(co(c0, cquot, c2), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), wcel(c2, cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p))))
  eldifsn(c2, cfv(cply, cc), c0p)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cply, cc), c2, cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)), cquot, crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))), crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wsbc(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))))
  riotabidv(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wsbc(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))
  bitrd(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wsbc(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))), wsbc(hs2, c3, wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))))
  sbceq1d(hs2, co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), c3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))
  syl6eqr(co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), c3, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  sylan2(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cof(cmin), co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0))), co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0)), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))))
  oveq1(cv(hs1), c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))
  oveq12(cv(hs0), c0, co(cv(hs1), cof(cmul), cv(s0)), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0)), cof(cmin))
  syl5bb(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wsbc(hs2, c3, wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))
  sbcie(hs2, c3, wo(wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))
  ovexi(c3, c0, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0)))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs2), c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))))
  eqeq1(cv(hs2), c3, c0p)
  breq1d(cfv(cdgr, cv(hs2)), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, c3), wceq(cv(hs2), c3))
  fveq2(cv(hs2), c3, cdgr)
  orbi2d(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1))), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))
  breq2d(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)), cfv(cdgr, c2), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  fveq2d(cdgr, cv(hs1), c2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)))
  simpr(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  df-quot(hs0, hs1, s0, hs2)
  riotaex(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cply, cc))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)))
  diff.hs0.c(crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cply, cc))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)))
  diff.hs1.c(crio(s0, cfv(cply, cc), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.w(wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, cv(hs1)))))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm quotval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚â† 0p)‚Üí(c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),(c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(c0[oF(-)](c2[oF(√ó)]s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl3an1(c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1), c2 ‚â† 0p, (c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),(c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))), c0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ))
  sseli(c0, (Poly ` c1), (Poly ` ‚ÑÇ))
  syl3an2(c0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1), c2 ‚â† 0p, (c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),(c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))), c2 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ))
  sseli(c2, (Poly ` c1), (Poly ` ‚ÑÇ))
  plyssc(c1)
  3impb(c0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), c2 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), c2 ‚â† 0p, (c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),(c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))))
  sylan2br(c0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), (c2 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ)‚àß c2 ‚â† 0p), (c0[quot]c2)= iota(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),(c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))), c2 ‚àà((Poly ` ‚ÑÇ)\ { 0p }))
  eldifsn(c2, (Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), c0p)
  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, (Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), c2, ((Poly ` ‚ÑÇ)\ { 0p }), cquot, iota(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),(c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))), iota(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),[(hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(√ó)]s0))/ hs2](hs2 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1))))
  riotabidv(s0, (Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), [(hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(√ó)]s0))/ hs2](hs2 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)), (c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2)))
  bitrd((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), [(hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(√ó)]s0))/ hs2](hs2 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)), (c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2)), [c3 / hs2](hs2 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  sbceq1d(hs2, (hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(√ó)]s0)), c3, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), (hs2 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  syl6eqr((hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(√ó)]s0)), c3, (c0[oF(-)](c2[oF(√ó)]s0)), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  sylan2(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2, (hs0[oF(-)](hs1[oF(√ó)]s0))=(c0[oF(-)](c2[oF(√ó)]s0)), (hs1[oF(√ó)]s0)=(c2[oF(√ó)]s0))
  oveq1(hs1, c2, oF(√ó), s0)
  oveq12(hs0, c0, (hs1[oF(√ó)]s0), (c2[oF(√ó)]s0), oF(-))
  syl5bb((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), [c3 / hs2](hs2 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)), (c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2)), (c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  sbcie(hs2, c3, (hs2 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1)), (c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  ovexi(c3, c0, oF(-), (c2[oF(√ó)]s0))
  orbi12d(hs2 = c3, hs2 = 0p, (deg ` hs2)[<](deg ` hs1), c3 = 0p, (deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1))
  eqeq1(hs2, c3, c0p)
  breq1d((deg ` hs2), clt, (deg ` hs1), (deg ` c3), hs2 = c3)
  fveq2(hs2, c3, cdgr)
  orbi2d((hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2), c3 = 0p, (deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1), (deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))
  breq2d((deg ` c3), clt, (deg ` hs1), (deg ` c2), (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  fveq2d(cdgr, hs1, c2, (hs0 = c0 ‚àß hs1 = c2))
  simpr(hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  df-quot(hs0, hs1, s0, hs2)
  riotaex(s0, (Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), (c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2)))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Poly ` ‚ÑÇ))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(((Poly ` ‚ÑÇ)\ { 0p }))
  diff.hs0.c(iota(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),(c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Poly ` ‚ÑÇ))
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(((Poly ` ‚ÑÇ)\ { 0p }))
  diff.hs1.c(iota(s0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),(c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2))))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 = c0, hs1 = c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.w((c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` hs1)))
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: plydivlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ plydivalg . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plydivlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(nat0, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wcel(nat0, c0)), wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), c0)))
  syl5eqelr(nat0, c0, co(nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1)), w0)
  1pneg1e0()
  caovcld(s0, s1, nat1, caddc, cneg(nat1), c0, c0, c0, w0)
  syl5eqelr(nat1, c0, co(cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1)), w0)
  neg1mulneg1e1()
  caovcld(s0, s1, cneg(nat1), cmul, cneg(nat1), c0, c0, c0, w0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm plydivlem1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí 0 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0))‚Üí(s0[+]s1)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c0))‚Üí(s0[√ó]s1)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚â† 0))‚Üí(1[√∑]s0)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí -u(1)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 ‚Üí 0 ‚àà c0), ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s0 ‚â† 0))‚Üí(1[√∑]s0)‚àà c0))
  syl5eqelr(nat0, c0, (1[+]-u(1)), w0)
  1pneg1e0()
  caovcld(s0, s1, nat1, caddc, -u(1), c0, c0, c0, w0)
  syl5eqelr(nat1, c0, (-u(1)[√ó]-u(1)), w0)
  neg1mulneg1e1()
  caovcld(s0, s1, -u(1), cmul, -u(1), c0, c0, c0, w0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s1, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s1)
  diff.cneg.s(s0, nat1)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: plydivlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ plydivalg . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plydivlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c3, c0p))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c2, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0))), wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1)), c0)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0))), wi(w0, wne(c3, c0p)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cply, c0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c0))), diffsc(s0, c0))

thm plydivlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c0))‚Üí(s1[+]s2)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c0))‚Üí(s1[√ó]s2)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚â† 0))‚Üí(1[√∑]s1)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí -u(1)‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚â† 0p)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(c2[oF(-)](c3[oF(√ó)]s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)), ((w0 ‚àß(s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s1 ‚â† 0))‚Üí(1[√∑]s1)‚àà c0))
  a1ii(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)), (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚â† 0p))
  a1ii(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)), d(s1, c1))
  a1ii(((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))‚Üí c1 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)), d(s2, c1))
  syl5eqel(c1, (Poly ` c0), (c2[oF(-)](c3[oF(√ó)]s0)), (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)))
  plysub(s1, s2, c2, (c3[oF(√ó)]s0), c0, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0), c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))
  plymul(s1, s2, c3, s0, c0, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0)))
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0), c3 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))
  simpr(w0, s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))
  adantlr(w0, s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c0), (s1[+]s2)‚àà c0)
  adantlr(w0, s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0), (s1 ‚àà c0 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c0), (s1[√ó]s2)‚àà c0)
  adantr(w0, s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0), -u(1)‚àà c0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c3, oF(√ó), s0)
  diff.cof.s(s1, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s2, c3, oF(√ó), s0)
  diff.cof.s(s2, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, (Poly ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cply, c0)
  diff.cply.s(s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, w0, s0 ‚àà(Poly ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, (Poly ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cply, c0)

  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: plydivex
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ plydivalg . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm plydivex(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))), wcel(co(cv(s1), cmul, cv(s2)), c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wne(cv(s1), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c2, c0p))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c3, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), diffsc(s1, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wrex(s0, cfv(cply, c0), wo(wceq(c1, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c1), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))), diffsc(s1, c3))

blocks.name: plydivalg
blocks.content: The division algorithm on polynomials over a subfield ` S ` of the complex numbers. If ` F ` and ` G =/= 0 ` are polynomials over ` S ` , then there is a unique quotient polynomial ` q ` such that the remainder ` F - G x. q ` is either zero or has degree less than ` G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: quotcl
blocks.content: The quotient of two polynomials in a field ` S ` is also in the field. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm quotcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cquot, c1), cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))), wcel(co(cv(s0), cmul, cv(s1)), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wne(cv(s0), nat0))), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s0)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cneg(nat1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(cply, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c1, c0p))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  simpld(w0, wcel(co(c0, cquot, c1), cfv(cply, c2)), wo(wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1))), c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1)))), clt, cfv(cdgr, c1))))
  quotlem(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1))), w0)
  eqid(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1))))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1)))
  diff.cof.s(s0, cmin)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1))
  diff.cof.s(s0, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cquot, c1)
  diff.cquot.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cof(cmin), co(c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1)))
  diff.cof.s(s1, cmin)
  diff.cmin.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c1))
  diff.cof.s(s1, cmul)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, cquot, c1)
  diff.cquot.s(s1)
}

} = {
  simpld(w0, (c0[quot]c1)‚àà(Poly ` c2), ((c0[oF(-)](c1[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c1)))= 0p ‚à®(deg `(c0[oF(-)](c1[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c1))))[<](deg ` c1)))

blocks.name: quotcl2
blocks.content: Closure of the quotient function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm quotcl2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wcel(co(c0, cquot, c2), cfv(cply, cc)))
} = {
  quotcl(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cc, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cc))
  mulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cc))
  reccl(cv(hs0))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wcel(cneg(nat1), cc))
  neg1cn()
  sseldi(c0, cfv(cply, cc), cfv(cply, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p))
  sseldi(c2, cfv(cply, cc), cfv(cply, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)))
  plyssc(c1)
  simp2(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)))
  diff.hs1.w(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)))
}

thm quotdgr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c2, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c2))))
} = {
  simprd(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wo(wceq(c3, c0p), wbr(cfv(cdgr, c3), clt, cfv(cdgr, c2))), wcel(co(c0, cquot, c2), cfv(cply, cc)))
  quotlem(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cc, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cc))
  mulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wne(cv(hs0), nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, cv(hs0)), cc))

  neg1cn()

  simp1(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p))
  sseldi(c2, cfv(cply, cc), cfv(cply, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p)))
  plyssc(c1)

  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(cply, c1)), wne(c2, c0p))

  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  diff.hs1.c(c3)

thm quotdgr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚â† 0p)‚Üí(c3 = 0p ‚à®(deg ` c3)[<](deg ` c2)))

} = {

  quotlem(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, cc, c3, (c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚â† 0p))

  mulcl(hs0, hs1)
  adantl((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚â† 0p), (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs0 ‚â† 0), (1[√∑]hs0)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  reccl(hs0)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚â† 0p), -u(1)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  neg1cn()
  sseldi(c0, (Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), (Poly ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚â† 0p))
  simp1(c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1), c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1), c2 ‚â† 0p)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚â† 0p))
  diff.hs1.w((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚â† 0p))

thm plyremlem(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), w3a(wcel(c1, cfv(cply, cc)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c1), nat1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0)), csn(c0))))
  -| wceq(c1, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c0))))
} = {
  3jca(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, cc)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c1), nat1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0)), csn(c0)))
  eqtr3d(cfv(cdgr, c1), nat1, cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), cof(caddc), cidp)), wcel(c0, cc))
  fveq2d(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), cof(caddc), cidp), c1, wcel(c0, cc))
  syl6eqr(co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), cof(caddc), cidp), c1, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c0))), wcel(c0, cc))
  3eqtr4d(co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), cof(caddc), cidp), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c0))), cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cneg(c0), caddc, cv(hs0))), cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  mpteq2dva(hs0, cc, co(cneg(c0), caddc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  eqtrd(co(cneg(c0), caddc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0), co(cv(hs0), caddc, cneg(c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cneg(c0), caddc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, cneg(c0))), wcel(cneg(c0), cc))
  addcom(cneg(c0), cv(hs0))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cneg(c0)), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)))
  negsub(cv(hs0), c0)
  offval2(hs0, cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), caddc, cidp, cc, cneg(c0), cv(hs0), universe, universe, cc, wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)), wcel(cneg(c0), universe))
  negex(c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), cmpt(hs0, cc, cneg(c0))))
  fconstmpt(hs0, cc, cneg(c0))
  syl3anc(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(cdgr, co(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), cof(caddc), cidp)), nat1), wcel(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(cidp, cfv(cply, cc)), wbr(cfv(cdgr, cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0)))), clt, nat1))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), cfv(cply, cc)), wss(cc, cc), wcel(cneg(c0), cc))
  plyconst(cc, cneg(c0))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cidp, cfv(cply, cc)))
  syl6eqbr(cfv(cdgr, cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0)))), clt, nat1, nat0, wcel(c0, cc))
  syl(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cfv(cdgr, cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0)))), nat0), wcel(cneg(c0), cc))
  negcl(c0)
  0dgr(cneg(c0))
  0lt1()
  dgradd2(cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0))), cc, cidp, cfv(cdgr, cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0)))), nat1)
  eqid(cfv(cdgr, cxp(cc, csn(cneg(c0)))))
  eqcomi(nat1, cfv(cdgr, cidp))
  dgrid()
  eqrdv(hs0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0)), csn(c0), wcel(c0, cc))
  syl6bbr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  3bitr4d(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), nat0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0), nat0))
  eqeq1d(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), nat0, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  eqtrd(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)), cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)), cv(hs0))))
  fveq1d(c1, cv(hs0), cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)), wcel(c0, cc))
  syl5eq(c1, cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c0))), wcel(c0, cc))
  offval2(hs0, cidp, cmin, cxp(cc, csn(c0)), cc, cv(hs0), c0, universe, cc, cc, wcel(c0, cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  simpl(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cidp, cmpt(hs0, cc, cv(hs0))))
  eqtr4i(cidp, cmpt(hs0, cc, cv(hs0)), cres(cid, cc))
  df-idp()
  mptresid(hs0, cc)
  a1i(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cxp(cc, csn(c0)), cmpt(hs0, cc, c0)))
  fconstmpt(hs0, cc, c0)
  sylancl(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)), cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0), universe))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  ovex(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)
  fvmpt2(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0), universe, cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)))
  eqid(cmpt(hs0, cc, co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wb(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmin, c0), nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  subeq0(cv(hs0), c0)
  4syl(wcel(c0, cc), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(hs0)), nat0))), wcel(c1, cfv(cply, cc)), wf(c1, cc, cc), wfn(c1, cc))
  syl5eqel(c1, cfv(cply, cc), co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c0))), wcel(c0, cc))
  sylancr(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c0))), cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(cidp, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(cxp(cc, csn(c0)), cfv(cply, cc)))
  mp2an(wcel(cidp, cfv(cply, cc)), wss(cc, cc), wcel(nat1, cc))
  ax-1cn()
  plyid(cc)
  mpan(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(cxp(cc, csn(c0)), cfv(cply, cc)), wss(cc, cc))
  ssid(cc)
  plyconst(cc, c0)
  plysubcl(cidp, cc, cxp(cc, csn(c0)))
  plyf(c1, cc)
  ffn(c1, cc, cc)
  fniniseg(c1, cc, cv(hs0), nat0)
  pm4.71rd(wcel(c0, cc), wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  eleq1a(c0, cc, cv(hs0))
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cc))
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(cneg(c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cmin)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c0))
}

  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí(c1 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ)‚àß(deg ` c1)= 1 ‚àß(`' c1 " { 0 })= { c0 }))
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Xp[oF(-)](‚ÑÇ √ó { c0 }))

  sylancr(c0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (‚ÑÇ √ó { -u(c0)})‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), ‚ÑÇ ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ, -u(c0)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)

  negcl(c0)

  0lt1()
  dgradd2((‚ÑÇ √ó { -u(c0)}), cc, cidp, (deg `(‚ÑÇ √ó { -u(c0)})), nat1)
  eqid((deg `(‚ÑÇ √ó { -u(c0)})))
  eqcomi(nat1, (deg ` Xp))

blocks.name: plyrem
blocks.content: The polynomial remainder theorem, or little Bézout's theorem (by contrast to the regular Bézout's theorem ~ bezout ). If a polynomial ` F ` is divided by the linear factor ` x - A ` , the remainder is equal to ` F ( A ) ` , the evaluation of the polynomial at ` A ` (interpreted as a constant polynomial). This is part of Metamath 100 proof #89. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: facth
blocks.content: The factor theorem. If a polynomial ` F ` has a root at ` A ` , then ` G = x - A ` is a factor of ` F ` (and the other factor is ` F quot G ` ). This is part of Metamath 100 proof #89. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm facth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wceq(c0, co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))))
  -| wceq(c3, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c2))))
} = {
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wceq(c0, co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), cxp(cc, csn(nat0))))
  eqtrd(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), cxp(cc, csn(nat0)), cxp(cc, csn(cfv(c0, c2))), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0), wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), cxp(cc, csn(cfv(c0, c2)))))
  plyrem(c0, c1, c2, co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), c3)
  eqid(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))))
  xpeq2d(cc, csn(cfv(c0, c2)), csn(nat0), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  sneqd(cfv(c0, c2), nat0, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wb(wceq(co(c0, cof(cmin), co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3))), cxp(cc, csn(nat0))), wceq(c0, co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)))), wcel(cc, universe), wf(c0, cc, cc), wf(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)), cc, cc))
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wf(c0, cc, cc), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)))
  plyf(c0, c1)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wf(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)), cc, cc), wcel(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)), cfv(cply, cc)))
  syl2anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wcel(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)), cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(co(c0, cquot, c3), cfv(cply, cc)))
  syl3anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wcel(co(c0, cquot, c3), cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c0, cfv(cply, cc)), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, cc)), wne(c3, c0p))
  sseldi(c0, cfv(cply, cc), cfv(cply, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  plyssc(c1)
  simp1(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0))
  simp1d(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, cc)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(nat0)), csn(c2)))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wne(c3, c0p), wne(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat0))
  eqnetrd(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat0, nat1, w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)))
  simp2d(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat1), wcel(c3, cfv(cply, cc)), wceq(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(nat0)), csn(c2)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0), w3a(wcel(c3, cfv(cply, cc)), wceq(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat1), wceq(cima(ccnv(c3), csn(nat0)), csn(c2))))
  plyremlem(c2, c3)
  a1i(w3a(wcel(c0, cfv(cply, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wceq(cfv(c0, c2), nat0)), wne(nat1, nat0))
  ax-1ne0()
  necon3i(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat0, c3, c0p)
  syl6eq(cfv(cdgr, c3), nat0, cfv(cdgr, c0p), wceq(c3, c0p))
  fveq2(c3, c0p, cdgr)
  dgr0()
  quotcl2(c0, cc, c3)
  plymulcl(c3, cc, co(c0, cquot, c3))
  plyf(co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)), cc)
  ofsubeq0(cc, universe, c0, co(c3, cof(cmul), co(c0, cquot, c3)))
}

thm facth(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0)‚Üí c0 =(c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3)))
  ‚ä£ c3 =(Xp[oF(-)](‚ÑÇ √ó { c2 }))
} = {
  mpbid((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), c0 =(c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3)), (c0[oF(-)](c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3)))=(‚ÑÇ √ó { 0 }))
  eqtrd((c0[oF(-)](c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3))), (‚ÑÇ √ó { 0 }), (‚ÑÇ √ó {(c0 ` c2)}), (c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0))
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (c0 ` c2)= 0, (c0[oF(-)](c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3)))=(‚ÑÇ √ó {(c0 ` c2)}))
  plyrem(c0, c1, c2, (c0[oF(-)](c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3))), c3)
  eqid((c0[oF(-)](c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3))))
  xpeq2d(cc, {(c0 ` c2)}, { 0 }, (c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0))
  sneqd((c0 ` c2), nat0, (c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0))
  simp3(c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (c0 ` c2)= 0)
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), ((c0[oF(-)](c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3)))=(‚ÑÇ √ó { 0 })‚Üî c0 =(c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3))), ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå, (c0 : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), ((c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3)): ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), ‚ÑÇ ‚àà ùïå)
  cnex()
  syl((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), (c0 : ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1))
  plyf(c0, c1)
  syl((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), ((c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3)): ‚ÑÇ ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), (c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3))‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), (c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3))‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), c3 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), (c0[quot]c3)‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ))
  syl3anc((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), (c0[quot]c3)‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), c0 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), c3 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), c3 ‚â† 0p)
  sseldi(c0, (Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), (Poly ` c1), (c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0))
  plyssc(c1)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (c0 ` c2)= 0)
  simp1d((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), c3 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), (deg ` c3)= 1, (`' c3 " { 0 })= { c2 })
  syl((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), c3 ‚â† 0p, (deg ` c3)‚â† 0)
  eqnetrd((deg ` c3), nat0, nat1, (c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0))
  simp2d((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), (deg ` c3)= 1, c3 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ), (`' c3 " { 0 })= { c2 })
  3ad2ant2(c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1), c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (c0 ` c2)= 0, (c3 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ)‚àß(deg ` c3)= 1 ‚àß(`' c3 " { 0 })= { c2 }))
  plyremlem(c2, c3)
  a1i((c0 ‚àà(Poly ` c1)‚àß c2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß(c0 ` c2)= 0), 1 ‚â† 0)

  plymulcl(c3, cc, (c0[quot]c3))
  plyf((c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3)), cc)
  ofsubeq0(cc, universe, c0, (c3[oF(√ó)](c0[quot]c3)))

blocks.name: fta1lem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ fta1 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm fta1lem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c1))))
  -| wceq(c0, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cn0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cdgr, c1), co(c2, caddc, nat1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cdif(cfv(cply, cc), csn(c0p)), wi(wceq(cfv(cdgr, cv(s0)), c2), wa(wcel(cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), csn(nat0)), cfn), wbr(cfv(chash, cima(ccnv(cv(s0)), csn(nat0))), cle, cfv(cdgr, cv(s0)))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, cfn), wbr(cfv(chash, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c1)))
  eqeltrd(c0, cfn, cun(cima(ccnv(co(c1, cquot, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3))))), csn(nat0)), csn(c3)), w0)
  eqbrtrd(cfv(chash, c0), cle, cfv(cdgr, c1), cfv(chash, cun(cima(ccnv(co(c1, cquot, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3))))), csn(nat0)), csn(c3))), w0)
  fveq2d(chash, c0, cun(cima(ccnv(co(c1, cquot, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3))))), csn(nat0)), csn(c3)), w0)
  3eqtr4g(c0, cun(cima(ccnv(co(c1, cquot, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3))))), csn(nat0)), csn(c3)), cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0)), cun(csn(c3), cima(ccnv(co(c1, cquot, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3))))), csn(nat0))), w0)
  3eqtrd(cima(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0)), cun(csn(c3), cima(ccnv(co(c1, cquot, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3))))), csn(nat0))), cima(ccnv(co(co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3))), cof(cmul), co(c1, cquot, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3)))))), csn(nat0)), cun(cima(ccnv(co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3)))), csn(nat0)), cima(ccnv(co(c1, cquot, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3))))), csn(nat0))), w0)
  imaeq1d(ccnv(c1), csn(nat0), ccnv(co(co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3))), cof(cmul), co(c1, cquot, co(cidp, cof(cmin), cxp(cc, csn(c3)))))), w0)

blocks.name: fta1
blocks.content: The easy direction of the Fundamental Theorem of Algebra: A nonzero polynomial has at most ` deg ( F ) ` roots. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jul-2014.)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà(Poly ` ‚ÑÇ),((c2 =(deg ` s1)‚àß(# `(`' s1 " { 0 }))=(deg ` s1))‚Üí sum(s2 ‚àà(`' s1 " { 0 }), s2)= -u((((coeff ` s1)`((deg ` s1)[-]1))[√∑]((coeff ` s1)`(deg ` s1)))))))

blocks.name: vieta1lem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ vieta1 : inductive step. Let ` z ` be a root of ` F ` . Then ` F = ( Xp - z ) x. Q ` for some ` Q ` by the factor theorem, and ` Q ` is a degree- ` D ` polynomial, so by the induction hypothesis ` sum_ x e. ( ``' Q " 0 ) x = -u ( coeff `` Q ) `` ( D - 1 ) / ` ` ( coeff `` Q ) `` D ` , so ` sum_ x e. R x = z - ( coeff `` Q ) `` ` ` ( D - 1 ) / ( coeff `` Q ) `` D ` . Now the coefficients of ` F ` are ` A `` ( D + 1 ) = ( coeff `` Q ) `` D ` and ` A `` D = ` ` sum_ k e. ( 0 ... D ) ( coeff `` Xp - z ) `` k x. ( coeff `` Q ) ` ` `` ( D - k ) ` , which works out to ` -u z x. ( coeff `` Q ) `` D ` ` + ( coeff `` Q ) `` ( D - 1 ) ` , so putting it all together we have ` sum_ x e. R x = -u A `` D / A `` ( D + 1 ) ` as we wanted to show. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: vieta1
blocks.content: The first-order Vieta's formula (see ~ http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vieta%27s_formulas ). If a polynomial of degree ` N ` has ` N ` distinct roots, then the sum over these roots can be calculated as ` -u A ( N - 1 ) / A ( N ) ` . (If the roots are not distinct, then this formula is still true but must double-count some of the roots according to their multiplicities.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: plyexmo
blocks.content: An infinite set of values can be extended to a polynomial in at most one way. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Nov-2014.)
